definition: item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: He needs the specific dates their componets orders were placed last month.
sentences.chinese: 他要他們上個月提出的機件訂單的詳細日期。

sentences.english: Machine parts of irregular shape can be washed very clean by ultrasonics.
sentences.chinese: 用超聲波能把形狀不規則的機件洗得很乾淨。

sentences.english: The usual mechanism which gives the reed its motion is known AS the lay.
sentences.chinese: 驅動鋼筘運動的機件通常稱爲筘座。

sentences.english: Each came equipped with a charger that plugs into an electrical outlet.
sentences.chinese: 每一個機件都裝有一個可插入電源插口的充電器。

sentences.english: Something must be wrong with the work.
If take expected downtime, easy cause parts damaged.
sentences.chinese: 如果帶料停機，很容易造成機件損壞。

sentences.english: She unscrewed the back, fixed the mechanism and put it back together.
sentences.chinese: 她旋開背板，修好了機件，再將背板裝回去。

sentences.english: Machine mechanical Slowly device can avoid the overload caused by a breakdown.
sentences.chinese: 機上的機械緩行裝置可避免因過載而引起的機件損壞。

sentences.english: Do not have the above-mentioned mechanical pH and high temperature on the place.
sentences.chinese: 切勿將上述機件放在有酸鹼和高溫的地方。

sentences.english: The boy jiggered up the machinery in his first attempt at fixing the clock.
sentences.chinese: 男孩一動手修鍾就把機件弄亂了。

sentences.english: The mechanical slowing-down device on the machine may prevent damage to parts caused by overload.
sentences.chinese: 機上的機械緩行裝置可避免因過載而引起的機件損壞。

sentences.english: Every compartment had some minor breakage or malfunction to report .
sentences.chinese: 每間艙房總有些小毛病或機件失靈的事故上報。

sentences.english: The gadget takes apart for cleaning.
sentences.chinese: 這個小機件是可以拆開來洗的。

sentences.english: Do not oil or adjust unguarded machines while any parts are in motions.
sentences.chinese: 當任何機件正在運轉中，不要添油或調機。

sentences.english: The components of the same type are interchangeable, It is the trustable product for customers at home and abroad.
sentences.chinese: 同型號機件可互換，是國內外用戶信得過產品。

sentences.english: Refining the use of stainless steel internal mechanical, corrosion-resistant, durable.
sentences.chinese: 內部機件採用不鏽鋼精製，抗腐蝕，經久耐用。

definition: out with the old and in with the new (idiom)
to abrade/to scrape/to chafe/to graze/abrasion/friction burn/scratch
